title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Miami Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress
text: March 24, 2018 / 1:22 AM / Updated 19 hours ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Miami Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 6 Min Read Mar 24 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Miami Masters Men's Singles matches on Friday ..
